modName: The Art of Beard - New Facial Hairs
summary:
This mod adds 11 new beards. They are not lumberjack beards but they are beards.
Look at the screen shots for examples.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=4]
Have you ever wanted to have an [b]Oberyn Martell[/b] style beard? Are you bored with the current selection of beards? Well look no further! [b]This mod adds 7 new beards![/b] I will add more based off of ideas and suggestions from you! Or if I personally want to add one I will. [b]BEARDS BEARDS BEARDS.[/b] (There not really beards yet. More like just facial hair.)


I mix beards to form new beards. So I cannot make completely new ones.
[font=Tahoma][color=#e06666][size=5][color=#8e7cc3][color=#e06666]
Suggested Mods[/color]
[/color][color=#6aa84f][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]BEARDS[/url] [color=#ffffff][size=4]for good looking HD textures[/size][/color][/color]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][font=Tahoma][color=#e06666][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/font]
None.
[color=#e06666][font=Tahoma][size=5]Installation[/size][/font]
[color=#ffffff]I highly recommend[color=#e06666] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/url]
[color=#ffffff]To install manually just drag the data folder into the skyrim directory.[/color]

[color=#ffffff]
Also some NPCs have the new beards.
[/color][/color][/color][/color][/font][/size][/font]
author: Gourdknight AKA Rillyhilly AKA Creeperation
